variants.HGVS: N.D. (HGVS nomenclature standardization via API is not possible without specific transcript information in the provided text. However, based on the text, the cDNA and protein changes can be inferred as follows)
variants.Description in input context: G2019S (a common mutation in the Mg²⁺ binding motif at the beginning of the activation loop of the kinase domain)
I2020T (mutation at the adjacent isoleucine in the original family reported to have autosomal dominant PD linked to this locus)
I1122V (mutation in the leucine - rich repeats)

Material used.Material Name: COS7, HEK293, SH - SY5Y cells, primary rat cortical neurons
Material used.Description: Full - length dardarin cDNA constructs were introduced into COS7, HEK293, SH - SY5Y cells using Fugene. Primary rat cortical neuron cultures were generated from E18 pups, transfected with constructs using Lipofectamine 2000.

Biological replicates.Description: Expression of mutants was representative of data seen at least three experiments per construct.

Material used.Description: Immunoprecipitated dardarin from mammalian cells was incubated in kinase reaction buffer containing ³²P - ATP.

Readout description.Conclusion: Produced a small increase in autophosphorylation activity (P < 0.05)
Readout description.Result Description: Incorporation of radiolabel into the major band of >260 kDa representing GFP - tagged dardarin was higher compared to some other mutants

Readout description.Conclusion: Did not show an increase in autophosphorylation activity
Readout description.Result Description: Incorporation of radiolabel into the major band of >260 kDa representing GFP - tagged dardarin was not increased

Readout description.Conclusion: Did not show an increase in autophosphorylation activity
Readout description.Result Description: Incorporation of radiolabel into the major band of >260 kDa representing GFP - tagged dardarin was not increased

Readout description.Conclusion: Deficient in autophosphorylation (P < 0.001 compared to wild type by one - way ANOVA)
Readout description.Result Description: Reduced incorporation of radiolabel into the major band of >260 kDa representing GFP - tagged dardarin

Biological replicates.Description: Quantification was done from quadruplicate experiments.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One - way ANOVA was used to analyze the autophosphorylation data.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Human brain Western blotting and immunohistochemistry

Material used.Material Name: Human frontal cortex, midbrain sections from neurologically normal individuals and sporadic PD cases
Material used.Description: For Western blotting, protein extracts from human frontal cortex were used. For immunohistochemistry, 7μm fixed, wax - embedded tissue sections from two pathologically verified sporadic PD cases were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Antibody NB300 - 267 recognized a band of approximately 260 kDa in human brain lysates. In midbrain sections, the antibody stained cell bodies and processes of midbrain melanized dopamine neurons in normal individuals and in sporadic PD cases. Dardarin immunoreactivity was seen in the halo of some Lewy bodies in sporadic PD cases.

Basic negative control.Description: A scrambled shRNA was used as a negative control for LRRK2 knockdown in HEK cells.

Material used.Material Name: SH - SY5Y cells, primary rat cortical neurons
Material used.Description: Full - length wild - type or mutant dardarin was transfected into SH - SY5Y cells. Primary rat cortical neurons were also transfected with constructs.

Readout description.Conclusion: Induced nuclear shrinkage, especially after 3 - 4 days post - transfection. Increased the number of transfected TUNEL - positive cells. Induced significant cell death (P < 0.001 by ANOVA compared to wild type).
Readout description.Result Description: Nuclear morphology changes were observed. Number of TUNEL - positive cells increased. Counts of cells with intact nuclei decreased.

Readout description.Conclusion: Induced nuclear shrinkage. Induced significant cell death (P < 0.001 by ANOVA compared to wild type).
Readout description.Result Description: Nuclear morphology changes were observed. Counts of cells with intact nuclei decreased.

Readout description.Conclusion: Decreased the amount of cell death. Delayed cell death compared to kinase - active form. Decreased the number of transfected TUNEL - positive cells to the same level as wild - type protein (P < 0.01 by ANOVA compared to Y1699C).
Readout description.Result Description: Fewer cells showed nuclear shrinkage. Lower number of TUNEL - positive cells.

Readout description.Conclusion: Decreased the amount of cell death. Delayed cell death compared to kinase - active form.
Readout description.Result Description: Fewer cells showed nuclear shrinkage. Counts of cells with intact nuclei were higher compared to kinase - active R1441C.

Biological replicates.Description: Four replicate transfections were used for SH - SY5Y cells. Four primary cultures were used per construct for primary rat cortical neurons.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two - way ANOVA was used to analyze the effects of constructs and time for SH - SY5Y cells. One - way ANOVA was used to analyze the effects of constructs for primary rat cortical neurons.
